hotels.vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
hotels.title: Margaret River Region Pullman Luxury Villas with Direct Beach Access
hotels.description: Experience five-star luxury in Western Australia's Margaret River region - and find yourself perched alongside the pristine sands of the near-private Bunker Bay, with direct beach access. Set among 35 acres of breathtaking native landscapes, indulge in an evening of culinary delight at the Other Side of the Moon Restaurant and Bar, where local and Indigenous flavours perfectly pair with the region's applauded wines. Float away in the heated infinity-edge swimming pool, try your hand at a game of tennis, relax at the world-class day spa or follow salt-licked walking trails along Cape Naturaliste's majestic coastline.

hotels.title: Tranquil Beachside Studio Stay in the Heart of Margaret River
hotels.description: Surrounded by Leeuwin-Naturaliste National Park and Margaret River’s renowned vineyards and chef-hatted restaurants, Seashells Yallingup beckons. Set within the beautiful gardens of the heritage-listed Caves House Hotel, with Yallingup Beach just a 10-minute stroll through breathtaking gardens, this self-contained escape promises a lush southwest escape. Beyond the comforts of your studio or self-contained apartment, complete with kitchenette and laundry facilities, the charms of this renowned region await. Descend into crystal-studded caves at Ngilgi Cave, just a short bushwalk from Seashells Yallingup, while away a day at Yallingup Cheese Company or enjoy a soak at Injidup Natural Spa. Balance all of this exploration with a well-deserved drop at the likes of Margaret River’s Leeuwin Estate or Voyager Estate, or simply enjoy the local cuisine on offer in Caves House Hotel’s intimate dining room.
